item.title: Digital Decluttering
item.description: Today I started looking at all of my digital data in an effort to remove anything that I don’t need anymore. I’m going through service by service and folder by folder. I have thousands of links saved in Pocket, around a hundred in my reading list in Chrome and thatâ€™s not mentioning the thousands and thousands of folders filled with documents, code repos and other stuff I have on my drives and personal cloud.
